newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 2.61 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 2.61 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index was up 2.61 percent or 1.99 points at 78.23 on Wednesday, after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30-share index rose 36.56 points or 1.10 percent to 3,352.62.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 10.51 percent after 10.56 percent on Tuesday.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
